title: Finite Dimensional Series and Its Applications in Number Theory and Mathematical Analysis
description:
reference: viXra:2211.0006v1
title: Finite Dimensional Series and Its Applications in Number Theory and Mathematical Analysis
authors: Shazly Abdullah
category: Number Theory
type: submission
date: 2022-11-01 00:50:49
abstract: In this study we used an algebraic method that uses elementary algebra and binomial theorem to create finite binomial series. This is a type of series that has several properties in variables. We used these series to prove results in congruences and primitive roots, Diophantine equation. We also obtained several results in finite series.
